definition: Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Hon Hai said it believes Apple will continue to thrive.
sentences.chinese: 鸿海说，它相信苹果将会继续茁壮成长。

sentences.english: Hon Hai spokesman Edmund Ding did not say when the raises would take effect.
sentences.chinese: 鸿海发言人丁祈安没有说加薪何时生效。

definition: Foxconn Technology Group/abbr. of 富士康科技集團|富士康科技集团[Fu4 shi4 kang1 ke1 ji4 ji2 tuan2]

pinyin: Fu4 shi4 kang1 Ke1 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Guo "Terry" Taiming (1950-), prominent Taiwanese businessman, founder of Foxconn

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
